channel.title: GyroScape - Old School PKing, Skilling Monster Hunting and More
channel.description:
[i][b]Banner removed due to containing website URL[/b][/i]
[b]GyroScape[/b]
~[i]Project Insanity[/i] Based~
[u]POSITIONS:[/u]
Coders: 1/2 Hoster: 1/1 Website/Forums: 1/1 Moderators: 0/2 Admins: 0/2 Advertisers: 1/as many as possible xD
[b]~About the Server~[/b] Here's the server I've been coding these past few days.
The goal of this server is to bring alive Old School PKing, Skilling, Monster Hunting, enjoying Minigames - you know, a lot of the things that made RuneScape what it was in 2006-2007.
Of course, not everything from 2008-2010 of RuneScape was crap. I'm also adding items like Dragon Claws, Dragon Plate, Spirit Shields, Corporeal Beast, PvP Armors and more.
What we aren't adding is the PvP Drops that are all based on Luck. A reason I quit the original RuneScape. Before "PvP worlds" you always knew what you were going to get in a drop - You could die, but then make your money back right away. In "PvP worlds" that never happened. It's all based on luck. You would kill someone with bandos and get a rune square shield.
We're re-doing skilling as well making it into w
[B]YES [/B]this server has an economy.
So here's what we've got so far!
[b]Features[/b][/u]
[b]Nonstop PKing[/b] -MageBank -Dragons -Portal Hopping (Yes, portals work!) -Edgeville 1v1 -PK Points System
[b]Skilling[/b] -Thieving (With pickpocketing) -Woodcutting -Mining -Slayer -Cooking -Fishing -Farming -Crafting -RuneCrafting -Smithing -Magic (alching ftw)
[b]Bosses[/b] -Armadyl Godwars -Bandos Godwars -Saradomin Godwars -King Black Dragon -Chaos Elemental -Dagannoth Kings (All three)
[b]Minigames[/b] -Fight Pits (We host Tournaments Here) -Duelling with staking! -Mage Arena Minigame -Fight Caves (Coming Soon)
[b]~What we plan to add~[/b] New Monsters - Corporeal Beast, Tarn PvP Armors Spirit Shields Dragon Claws (Coming shortly!) Dragon Platebodies Full Fight Caves -More
[b]Pictures[/b]
[IMG]http://i749.photobucket.com/albums/xx139/iValance/5.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i749.photobucket.com/albums/xx139/iValance/6.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i749.photobucket.com/albums/xx139/iValance/7.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i749.photobucket.com/albums/xx139/iValance/8.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i749.photobucket.com/albums/xx139/iValance/9.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i749.photobucket.com/albums/xx139/iValance/10.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i749.photobucket.com/albums/xx139/iValance/111.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i749.photobucket.com/albums/xx139/iValance/15.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i749.photobucket.com/albums/xx139/iValance/12.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i749.photobucket.com/albums/xx139/iValance/13.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i749.photobucket.com/albums/xx139/iValance/14.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i749.photobucket.com/albums/xx139/iValance/1.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i749.photobucket.com/albums/xx139/iValance/2.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i749.photobucket.com/albums/xx139/iValance/3.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i749.photobucket.com/albums/xx139/iValance/4.jpg[/img]
To apply for this, please use the following template or contact me on MSN - valance@live.com __________________________ Name: How old are you?: What are you applying for?: Any previous experience in this position?: Proof of experience?: __________________________
Thanks, Valance

The goal of this server is to bring alive Old School PKing, Skilling, Monster Hunting, enjoying Minigames - you know, a lot of the things that made RuneScape what it was in 2006-2007.

Of course, not everything from 2008-2010 of RuneScape was crap. I’m also adding items like Dragon Claws, Dragon Plate, Spirit Shields, Corporeal Beast, PvP Armors and more.

What we aren’t adding is the PvP Drops that are all based on Luck. A reason I quit the original RuneScape.
